items.title: Predictive ML Web App for APAC Markets
highlights: Engineered a predictive ML application with a responsive web UI for 200+ business users across 10+ APAC markets.
Improved promotional efficiency by 24% and reduced dependency on the data team via self-serve interfaces.
Managed timelines and deliverables through agile sprints.

items.title: Power BI Dashboards + App Storefront
highlights: Built Power BI dashboards reducing access time to application data by 90%.
Designed an application storefront improving discoverability by 50%.
Optimized database size by 30%, reducing load time by 20%.

items.title: SP Utilities Web Pages
highlights: Reduced customer support tickets by 20% via improved navigation and performance.

items.title: Virtual Reality Medical Emergency Simulator
highlights: Designed and developed an immersive VR medical training simulator in Unity3D with smooth interactions on consumer-grade hardware.
Received Silver accolade in the 22nd STEPS student semester project showcase.

items.title: Music and Lyrics Transcription App
highlights: Developed a Python + SpeechBrain pipeline for AI-driven melody & lyrics transcription.
Achieved F1 score of 0.75 and 18–20% WER.

items.title: ShooT_IT (AR Laser Tag System)
highlights: Created an augmented reality laser tag system integrating physical action with gameplay.
Implemented game logic using C# and MQTT with ~50ms lag for server-to-device game state updates.

items.title: TrailTales (Domestic Tourism App)
highlights: Designed and developed a cross-platform app to promote safe domestic tourism in Singapore.
Built high-fidelity mockups in Figma and implemented using Flutter, Firebase, and Google Maps API.
Launched a public beta with 20+ participants and iterated based on feedback.

items.title: INST630 Personal Portfolio Website
highlights: Multi-page portfolio with dynamic greeting/clock, SVG animation, theme toggle (localStorage), and interactive pages built throughout the semester.
